website_summaries.verdict: Works by releasing oxygen that travels the digestive tract, supporting healthy bacteria. It works great, but is gentle, making it a nice choice for users with a sensitive stomach.
pros: In addition to being vegan and containing zero nut-related products, these capsules have a neutral taste and relieve constipation overnight without cramping
cons: Capsules are large, may be hard to swallow
Amount of pills necessary to achieve results varies

customer_reviews.title: Expiration date covered with a sticker! EXPIRED 01/2018
customer_reviews.text: UNBELIEVABLE to sell something with an expired expiration date! Date was concealed with a sticker.
customer_reviews.author: 1 luckyduck

customer_reviews.title: Take Mag07 at night, get results by morning!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product for anyone trying to get on the right track health-wise because it will basically clean you out on the inside and you will feel a difference of before and after using the product. This is where the details get a little tmi but if you are reading reviews on this product it will be helpful to know this info. I was feeling bloated and crampy in my stomach and after taking the mag07 that night well let me just say that I was "cleared out" by morning and I may have even lost a pound or two thanks to the makers of Mag07!
customer_reviews.author: Frances C.

customer_reviews.title: Will not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I've always had regular bowel movements. But I purchased this as part of the 10 Day Green Smoothie Cleanse. After taking 3 pills the first evening, they did not work. My magic number is 4 pills. While I do have a good bm, this pill makes me incredibly nauseated. They are huge pills and I've even broken them apart and took them mixed with water. Big mistake. I'm also on blood pressure meds and this product gives me heart palpitations that I do not have when I don't use this. I'm afraid to continue using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rikesha Foster

customer_reviews.title: It's recommended you take 5 pills but even taking 2 or ...
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done! It's recommended you take 5 pills but even taking 2 or 3 at a time, per day, clears you out. DO NOT FART! An accident can occur. I suggest you take this on an empty stomach maybe late at night so by the morning, you'll be able to go. If you leave for work around 9, don't take the pills too late. You'll have to poop again before then unless you don't mind going in a public bathroom. In other words, do it on an OFF day.
customer_reviews.author: Jll

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I took 5 pills the first time and about 8 hours later they kicked in. However, that was too strong so I used 4 and then 3, which seems to be my magic number. I'd say 8-10 hours is the timeframe I have every time so I take it before bed. Though the sensation to use the restroom is strong, I've had no problem holding it until I was close to one. Also, there's not bad cramping which I was truly dreading.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Won't purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Would do zero stars if I could. I use to use this product all the time and it would work fantastic. However the last 2, yes, TWO bottles I've had, haven't worked AT ALL. The seller is ither using a placebo or the formula was changed. It sucks because in the past I wrote s great review for this product, and I've recommended it to a lot of people. And now my money has been waisted, because you can't return it!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Doyle

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: If you need a good cleansing, THIS IS IT. I was recommended this product through JJ Smith, and I am extremely satisfied with the results so far. I started with 3 capsules the first night, and increased to 5 by the 3rd night, and got results each time. I'm already noticing a difference in how certain clothes fit, so we'll see what my results are at the end of the 10 days!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Poo pills mag o7
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty expensive guys but it IS VERY worth it! It will clean you out like theres no tomorrow! I would suggest taking these the night before a day you plan to do absolutely NOTHING. I was fasting for a week (fasting guys not eating anything) then i took this and i still went 💩 so much you would think i ate all week! I didnt even know i had all that in there i weighed myself and lost 2 pounds from that..... Love it. It recommends 3 to 5. I tried 3 and it did nothing but 5 was when everything came out
customer_reviews.author: Berenice

customer_reviews.title: Glad I brought these pills despite the bad reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lot of bad reviews regarding different customers receiving expired pills, they received there pill bottle Tampered with ext . so I was extremely skeptical If i should make a purchase. Well I did ! And I’m glad I did because the package was great ! Pill bottle nice and sealed and the expiration date is on the bottom of the bottle.which by the way was not expired. The bottle does say on the side 012018 but that’s just apart of there labels (the exploration Date is on the bottom i repeat.
customer_reviews.author: Niqua Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Buy these now.
customer_reviews.text: I used to only poop 1x a week. No matter what harsh med I took. I'd just get a tummy ache and no movement. But these... I've been taking them daily for 3 months. My skin is clearer. I've lost weight. And I have a nice poo every day! They are not painful.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan house

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while to order this because of the price. I finally did and was excited to try it. Took 4 the first night and nothing. Took 5 the next night, still nothing. Took 5 the 3rd night, nothing. All that happened was that my stomach itself started hurting when I ate so quit taking them. Waste of $26
customer_reviews.author: Veonn E.

customer_reviews.title: I have had chronic constipation for the past 5 years and this has made my life so much better..
customer_reviews.text: This product changed my life...I have had chronic constipation for the past 5 years and this has made my life so much better...I did a colonic before using this regularly...I feel that this has pushed my body to go on its own more regularly....
customer_reviews.author: Ree.j

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these. Everytime I use them I always get rid of a couple of pounds of waste. And it's not like a regular cleanse where you have to stay glued to the bathroom all day. Take them at night, go in the morning, and go on about your day. I feel great. Just make sure to take them on an empty stomach with LOTS of water.
customer_reviews.author: MotherEarth

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does not work at all... severely bloated and no cleansing happened. Can’t return!
customer_reviews.author: Josie Adams

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have a long history with constipation and have tried EVERYTHING. This works. I am so happy but you may have to give it time. I have a very lazy gut. Gastro Medications that should work within hours take days to work for me. I take the higher of the recommended 3-5 pills/day at bedtime with plenty of water throughout the day and I am able to eliminate by noon the next day. It isn't ideal since I am usually at work (poo-pourri is my friend), but it is fine with me as long as it keeps working.
customer_reviews.author: N.W.E.

customer_reviews.title: didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I have had tremendous GI issues all related to constipation. After reading multiple reviews, I was excited to give this product a try. Sadly, It did absolutely nothing for me. I even took it with miralax. I took it exactly as it stated on the bottle, on an empty stomach with plenty of water. Still nothing. I'm sad I spent so much money on this and saw no results. Wish I could get a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works 🖒
customer_reviews.text: This product worked for me, the first day I took 3 to test it worked well, next day I took 5 and it surely flushed 💩💩💩 best thing of it is that there was no cramping. The only recommendation I'll give is: Don't trust a fart😂
customer_reviews.author: Johannica Lord-Demonbreun

customer_reviews.title: Love these but be careful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. It is definitely a detox and cleansing system. When I read the Google reviews, I laughed when someone said they saw their gum from third grade, but that just may be true. This definitely cleans you out and can even help with weight loss when used with a proper diet and clean eating. In my house we call them "Aunt Maggie".... and when Aunt Maggie comes to town you better watch out!!!! If you think it's a fart, ITS NOT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheena P

customer_reviews.title: Allergic Reaction - Rash/Hives on neck
customer_reviews.text: My mom introduced me to this product and I was excited to use it. I noticed I started waking up in the morning to a rash (like hives) on my neck. I took the product at night before bed (as recommended). After a process of elimination, I discovered that unfortunately this product was what was causing the rash. It sounds like this product has helped many people, which is wonderful. Please be mindful that if you experience any type of rash or hives, you should discontinue use.
customer_reviews.author: RSB

customer_reviews.title: Poop there it is!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as recommended by JJ Smith for the 10 day green smoothie cleanse. These things work. Plain and simple. I have chronic constipation. I took 3 capsules at night with the recommended amount of water everyday for 10 days. In the morning before work it went into action. It cleans you out!!! It didn’t have me running to the bathroom when it was time, but you can fill the fullness that prompts you to start heading that way. Make sure you drink the recommended amount of water when taking the Mag07.
customer_reviews.author: Shaunte'

customer_reviews.title: Works extremely well
customer_reviews.text: Please be advised Take this when you have two free days You will be glad you are home when you try this product This reminds me of magnesium citrate only in dehydrated pill form This is less harsh on the stomach It removes my bloating and I actually feel great afterwards I recommend drinking lots of water and eating soups n fruit n veggies while on this I only do it when I have two days free with only 3 pills (weekends only) I will buy again when I get low
customer_reviews.author: Watson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I got this, hoping for some sort of relief. I did not receive any. I started with 5 pills on day 1 and 7 pills day 2. They did nothing, except give me bloat and bad breath. I’d notice a few reviews saying that the product seemed inauthentic, and I can confirm that I went to my local health store and they did look different. I wish I’d known they were available there and that I could return these.
customer_reviews.author: Azul

customer_reviews.title: This product really works! Reviews are accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I have had chronic constipation and trouble being regular to the point of being constantly stressed about it. Even taking laxatives resulted waiting 8-12 hours at a time followed by painful cramps and unpredictability. No uncomfortable cramping with these and they were effective immediately the next morning! As someone else said, definitely do not trust a fart. These kicked in overnight and I felt my colon had an exorcism. Going to scale back to 3 pills a day in hopes of the reaction not being quite as... aggressive.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE - Does not work for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I had been experiencing a terrible bout of constipation. Tried everything OTC and nothing worked. Read good reviews on this and decided to try. Experienced horrible abdominal tenderness and pain along with pain in my backside. Only took 1-2 at night for 3 days. Now I can’t return because this product is not eligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Capsules were tampered with.
customer_reviews.text: These capsules were tampered with. I just opened the lid and a capsule was empty and squashed, the inside of the box had all white powdery stuff. The cotton ball that normally sits on top was pushed all the way out to the sides. Now it says I cant even return these for replacement? This is a ripoff.
customer_reviews.author: C Binnie

customer_reviews.title: Not something to play with.
customer_reviews.text: I had a serious bloating issues not anymore . I only started with three and tried to do five. Not really for five tablets. It truly works trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah6

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best way to counter the effects of opiates needed for pain. I can see how it would be beneficial to anyone who is challenged with gut issues. Hard to believe Dr's don't know about this and prescribe pharma products. Best colon cleanser in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Helen GriffisTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Just Ok
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this product one mandatory star and called the reviews fake. I’m improving the rating to 3 stars now because it did work, eventually. I took 5 on dat two because 3 didn’t work. The product did work but it wasn’t within an 8 hour period, more like 12 hours . I’m not too impressed that it took longer than most products to work for me but it’s better than I originally critiqued.
customer_reviews.author: K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this after a cheat day to "cleanse" my body so I can start my diet back. No cramps, you literally wake up and feel like you have to take a regular poo. You can literally feel the difference
customer_reviews.author: Keisha T.

customer_reviews.title: Truly Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: The pill size it a bit large. There is no taste. You need to drink a lot of water while taking these. Please only take before bed, unless you're home AllDay. These Truly Work!!! I started low dose (3) just to see if it worked. It did but not much. Went up for 2 additional night. So 5 for a good flush... No Cramping or discomfort, loose. I take around 10/1030p movement by 6a at least 2x within the hour. Main reason for use: Detox/Weighloss prior to sx. Will restart 60d po. Within 1 to 2 wk I was hooked to feeling lighter 🤣.
customer_reviews.author: Keyana Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: I take Lynzess 290mcg daily. Still have issues going and I take 2-6tablets of Mag-7 and it def helps. I brought the bottle to my G.I. Doc and he was pleased with the Ingredients and gave me the green light. I received a sample in my GNC box and was shocked that it worked for me, because NOTHING works for me! Chronic constipation is putting it lightly. I will buy this forever !! LOL
customer_reviews.author: HonaLulubaby

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: This is a gentle cleanse. I usually take them before bed on an empty stomach (5 capsules around 10pm) and I wake up around 5am. They don’t kick in until 6:45am through 7:45 am. I have two bowel movement between those hours with 5 capsules. This product is great if you have issues with daily bowel movements. Also the capsules show great results with shedding a few pounds with a healthy diet and large intake of water
customer_reviews.author: Shamira

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking this product (3 pills at night) for about 5 days now, in combination with a the Green Smoothie Cleanse by JJ Smith, and I’m liking the results! I don’t feel like I have to run to the bathroom. I can go on my on my own time, which is nice!!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: It works and it’s gentle!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works. I have chronic constipation and was relying on enemas for a long time but worried about the long term effects. Three or four of these pills in the evening and I have a normal, cramp-free bowel movement the next day, guaranteed! It’s been a miracle for me!
customer_reviews.author: J Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: It works it works it works, plus it’s gentle on the stomach!
customer_reviews.text: I have been backed up for days, I took this stuff and woah....it cleaned me all the way out. I had like a whole other person come out in my toilet lol this stuff definitely works. Drink plenty of water and let it set in your system overnight, because in the morning it’s a done deal lol love this stuff especially since I’m detoxing now.
customer_reviews.author: Shay shay

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is wow! It's 3am, and I'm not tired. You know why? Because alot of garbage is out of my system. I took three pills, and I'm glad I didn't do five. If you want the garbage, fumes, sludge, and debris out of your system, here's one way to do it. Now it may not work for everyone...it may be too strong....or not work at all. Oh and you might want to keep hydrated, and stay home for at least a few hours. And they're right don't trust a fart. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Reece

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Please start off with just one because this stuff does work well!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: The great one

customer_reviews.title: I love my prime it comes when it says it will
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to give this a five star. I love my prime it comes when it says it will. So I was nervous at first to take these considering I have taken so called natural ones before and felt like I was gonna just die, having to take three pills three times a day to have a hurt stomach but these are so smooth going in and comming out. It doesn't make your stomach bunch up just to know it's working I do recommend this to anyone who is looking for a gentle colon cleanse.
customer_reviews.author: kristy m

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: When I have one of those "bloated" days or ate too much of a good thing, I take 5 of these capsules and a few hours later or that morning, I have to go to the restroom and it is just like I never ate the night before...
customer_reviews.author: Mellany

customer_reviews.title: Good for a bowel movement
customer_reviews.text: I used it for five days. Five pills daily right before I went to sleep. I was having a movement daily and felt pretty cleaned out so I stopped using it. May try it again but I would use at night so you can relieve yourself first thing in the morning cause it’s coming.
customer_reviews.author: Seneca Saltmarch

customer_reviews.title: Great Item Worth A Penny... cleans your insides completely!!
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased these at a different store location but due to the current situation I have purchased here....thankful it's online for a great price!! Recommend if you're looking to shed some unwanted junk from the day before...simple take before you sleep drink lots of water and in the morning you'll flush out all toxins!! I swear by it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mancilla

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTION
customer_reviews.text: OMG, This stuff WORKS. I think that chewing GUM I swallowed in kindergarten has finally come out of me because of Mag 07. I take 5 pills a day for 10 days along with a green smoothie and a gallon of water. Peeing and pooping is my life. If you need to get regular Mag 07 is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Trina W.

customer_reviews.title: Natural Cleanse
customer_reviews.text: Love this product for a natural cleanse while drinking smoothies. It doesn't give you the "runs" but when you pee you may let go some other waste with It! Don't trust a fart.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonders!
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this by the Green Smoothie Cleanse book about two years ago and have ordered it multiple times. For some reason regular laxatives do not work for me but this stuff cleans me out (nasty, I know). I use this after every big trip I take as the travel and change in my diet while out of town often back me up. I also use it before starting any new workout program or diet.
customer_reviews.author: Pattymae

customer_reviews.title: They definetly work ..
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm, without cramping . Just make sure you try on weekend first to see how your body reacts. I tried on an off day and I’m glad I did cause it could have been a tragedy lol.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Different Packaging. Horrible reaction.
customer_reviews.text: I have never left a review on Amazon, but after this experience felt obligated. I have used this product for years. After ordering it on Amazon, it was different packaging but same name. I continued to take it as I had prior. It made me horribly sick. I didn’t think it could be this supplement because my body was used to it and never had this effect. I stopped taking it, but one two more occasions needed it because it had always helped me in the past so took it and yet sick again each time. There unfortunately is no return policy, so has been a waste of money that will end up in trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner upper
customer_reviews.text: Mag 07....yes if you need relief from too much bread over eating or just constipation, this is what you need. It definitely will rid you of waste. It really depends on how many you take 2-4, 4 being if you even think you need to pass gas you need to go and visit the rest room. It goes down really easy I take it right before I go to bed. I might try to change that up works in about 3-6 hours and yes everyone is different. The bottom line is this is a awesome product and it's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: BeautifulSoul

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. They must changed the ingredients. I took three pills nothing on another day took four pills had gas only . On Sunday I took five pills woke up Monday to only gas no bowel movement. End up using pinalim tea and that work great. Wish I could return the pills. Wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: Toitoi

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t a success, didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews for this product, I figured it’d be worth a shot. After following the instructions, taking 3 capsules on an empty stomach before bedtime, I woke up and waited to find that nothing was to happen... The next evening I took 5, the maximum dosage, again on an empty stomach, and nothing again! Maybe it’s just me, but it seems to work on a lot of people, just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amos Wilfer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it don’t hesitate
customer_reviews.text: If you suffer from constipation or just looking for a product that can help you cleanse this is for you! Great product overall great experience with it! No cramps , no pain and cleans you out perfectly .
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet Del Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the old formula! :-(
customer_reviews.text: This new formula does not work nearly as good as the older formula! I feel like you have to take so many pills before they actually work. The older formula 2 pills would do the trick. I do not recommend this new formula at all! I hope they switch back to the older formula.
customer_reviews.author: Luvmypet

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Some ladies in my keto group recommended this because I have chronic constipation but I bought a cheaper product that works better the first two times I purchased it. I have to constantly switch because my body get used to things, but it was as if my body was already familiar with this. It helped but not as much as I was hoping I'm giving it three stars because I paid almost double for what I paid for the other product that to me work better
customer_reviews.author: clova E Smith

customer_reviews.title: MagO7
customer_reviews.text: At one time I'd give this a 5 start but it no longer works well for me. I got a few friends using this product and it stopped working for them too. They have a new looking bottle and it makes me wonder if they changed their formula along with it. SO DISAPPOINTED....
customer_reviews.author: Hot Wheels

customer_reviews.title: Works and No Adverse Side Affects
customer_reviews.text: I read COUNTLESS reviews before I purchase anything especially if I am going to put it in my body. Saw very few reviews on YouTube and a few on Amazon. After researching I decided to purchase. It WORKS. I started with 4 pills that night and the next morning it was coming round the mountain! I felt like it got it all out! Didn't have any negative side effects. Also it didn't interfere with the rest of the day. I took it for 5 days and lost 8 pounds. Jump started my weight loss! Would recommend it if you want to see a difference in the scale and how you stomach looks through your shirt.
customer_reviews.author: TriedNReviewed

customer_reviews.title: Here come the waterfalls!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Mag for a couple years now. It's always my go to when I'm feeling bloated or just feel I need to cleanse. 5 is my magic #!! Take em when I lay down to bed and 6-7 hours later when I wake up I'm ready to go!! It's not a running to the toilet kind of thing, it's a morning pee then oh there it goes kinda thing. Lol. But stay close to toilet, depending on how backed up you are you might need another round. Oh, and don't DARE try n pass gas!! 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Santos0614

customer_reviews.title: 3rd order
customer_reviews.text: I have recommended this product to everyone I know. 1st let say I have horrible stomach issues including IBS... so I’m miserable most days. Until I found this!!! I do 3 pills for 3-4 days and then 2 for the remainder. I feel so much better w/ no pain & discomfort does not interfere with my Rx for IBS
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Stay near the toilet until you know it’s worked
customer_reviews.text: I tried the 5 pills for several days in a row and not much changed. The 5th day I woke up and had almost crapped myself in bed. I ran and managed to make it to the toilet. Spent a good part of the morning on the toilet. I like this better than doing a salt water flush. I hate the flavor of them and I have a hard time drinking that much water at once
customer_reviews.author: Traveling_Robinsons

customer_reviews.title: The truth
customer_reviews.text: Do not use this on vacation or when you have a busy next day...because hunnnnaaaayyyy! When you take it at night as instructed, the next morning you will be blessing the bathroom with no other options available. I know I lost a good 5 pounds the first time I tried this. Great detox and dietary supplement. Oh and I normally take 6 pills with a glass of room temp water right before bed.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bearrr

customer_reviews.title: Most likely caused a terrible flare up of fibromyalgia pain/symptoms!
customer_reviews.text: I only needed 3 for results. However, my fibromyalgia flared up the worst it ever has! No other exacerbating factors except this supplement! Now that I’m off it, I’m back to baseline!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I use this when I am not going to bathroom enough. Like if I go once a day for 3days in a row, I will take two at night to clean me out. If I haven't gone in 2days, I take 3. People use it for detox and when I am strong committed enough to detox for 10days I will try it for that then. But I'm grateful full for a natural way to cleanse.
customer_reviews.author: My L.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend by those on Keto diet.
customer_reviews.text: These where recommended by a friend who is on Keto. She reached a plateau and used this to assist in weight loss. She says they worked great for her. I took them a couple of weeks and didn't really notice a change in my bowel movements. Maybe they take a little longer to kick in or require a certain diet.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha

customer_reviews.title: Best detox product ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best detox product ever! I’ve loss several inches from my waistline and I have a boost of energy., seems as if the second I consume any foods which are high in carbs and or fat I’m running to the bathroom., however there aren’t any signs of discomfort as far as craps., it’s not bad on your stomach at all...
customer_reviews.author: Yes

customer_reviews.title: Cause debilitating dizziness and vomiting
customer_reviews.text: Beware of the fake reviews. I took only two pills yesterday and woke up this morning with excessive dizziness. I’m still suffering from the dizziness two hours later. My husband missed work and so did I because the room was literally spinning. I have never experienced anything like this before in my entire life. They made me vomit. On top of that you cannot get a refund. I threw the bottle right out. I’m here to tell all to becareful taking these supplements. I learned the hard way. This experience was the scariest in my life thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: Does work or causes painful diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping for some regularity with these but if I take the serving size I don't have a bowel movement and if I take 1 more still nothing and if I take 5 I have diarrhea. It is definitely not worth the high cost, I would buy something with the same ingredients for much cheaper if you are set on trying this combination of ingredients. I do not think the oxidization does anything special. I feel really ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am on my second bottle!
customer_reviews.text: This product may be easy to swallow for some; however, I have a difficult time swallowing coated pills of any sort. I do like that this product works in a way that it does not upset my stomach. It’s very gentle. I typically take these for a week. I take 4-5 the first two days then go down to maybe 2-3 the following days. Because these are coated they have no flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Nisha Lashae

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I just started taking this again, because of sluggish digestion, since having my gallbladder out many years ago. I took 4 the first night and I got up in the morning and used the bathroom. Nothing dramatic. I went again, later that morning. I tried taking two the next night and nothing happened, so decided on 3 capsules and I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: WORTH A TRY! Love it
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough positive things about this product. I have chronic C and I have tried everything from OTC to prescription to herbal to extreme measures. This worked 3 pills first night. This will be a staple in my life. I was worried about getting worst or feeling weird- I had non of that. Little gassy the whole next day (today) at work but it’s worth it. Will decrease dose to see if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Move :)
customer_reviews.text: Better than laxatives. NO bloating or painful gassy side effects like other laxatives tend to do. Just follow the instructions that are on the bottle. I take them when needed and the next day I produce at least 2 bowl movements.
customer_reviews.author: DVilla

customer_reviews.title: Love this product 👍🏾
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product.... if you use it as directed it will help eliminate the waste and my waistline went down drastically... I will by the product every time I want to detox. Elimination is natural, not an urgent need like most colon cleansers, no cramping either.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I frequently get this every couple months but this time I think I got a bad batch i n have taken it 3 times and nothing works. It didn't do anything which is unusual.
customer_reviews.author: blackstar

customer_reviews.text: Love this supplement. I take 3 at night and it starts working the next day. No cramps or running to the bathroom. It's a smooth move if you know what I mean. You will hear your stomach growling but it's just the oxygen working things out in there lol
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Gentle
customer_reviews.text: These work great. No pain and works gently overnight. Since I’m working from home, I would take in the morning and not worry about them working at an unwanted time. There are no, oh goodness I need to go, surprises. These are very gentle on your stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Cydney

customer_reviews.title: YES! Finally one that works!
customer_reviews.text: I have issues so taking 4-6 stool softeners a day. I friend with similar suggested trying this so I did. Oh Yes! I only started with 3 just to see what would happen. 3 of these, 2 nights in a row and wham! Everything started moving! No cramps! No bad after taste! Will work with these and find a maintenance level. We're all different so just have to see which dosage works. Thanks so much for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Beware!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking Mag07 for years and purchased these during the pandemic. They do not work like the Mag07 you buy from the store!!!! The label looks fake.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I have SIBO and the digestive issues that follow with it. This was helpful in getting my system regulated. I took 2 pills at night and one in the morning. Worked the first time - small movement but after a couple of days it’s gotten better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product as before.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not the same product anymore. IT did absolutely nothing for me. I Don’t recommend buying from these people. Also it is NOT returnable, as before it was.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Ross

customer_reviews.title: Only difference is the BM
customer_reviews.text: I know I have to go to the bathroom in the morning and it just aquirts coz it’s all liquid. Not sure if it worked though as I still weigh the same and I don’t feel any different except that my bowel movement is watery. I will try another bottle and and see what happens
customer_reviews.author: Jazz meeh

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Life saver! I have been taking medication that made me so constipated that I was about to cry. Tried milk of magnesia and worked but hate the taste of it. This pills are awesome. It doesn’t make you have painful cramps like other laxatives and I go in the morning, so no bad nights. Very happy with this purchase! (If you. Wonder.... no one gave me anything for this review, I am a true happy costumer).
customer_reviews.author: Emy

customer_reviews.title: Mag 07 is the GOAT
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It's really effective. It's doesn't cause any pain on discomfort it just flushes you out completely. I'm on my 3 reorder of this product. I use it in conjunction with my Green Smoothie Cleanses and detox with you weight loss and have seen great results.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work as well for me
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this product did not work as well as other brands on me. It produced painful bowel movements compared to other things i have tried before and i felt no difference in my stomach bloating and how it feels. I won't be using it again.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live without it!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always struggled with constipation and bowel issues, BUT this has completely solved all of that! I can’t live without it. I’m on my fourth bottle. I take two every night for maintenance and it has made such a HUGE difference in my life. Wonderful wonderful product!!
customer_reviews.author: amanda9306

customer_reviews.title: Not so great!
customer_reviews.text: This brand Mag07 is not like the others I have used in the past. The other brand I have used; I usually take 5 for 3-7 days to cleanse and it works fantastic from day 1, I decrease the dose for the last 3 days cleansing for a total of 10 days. This brand does not start working from day 1, I take the same amount as scheduled but the results are not really good if you are doing a complete colon cleanse. Will not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Yaya

customer_reviews.title: I’m a 5pill girl
customer_reviews.text: Find your pill number!!! Mine is 5. In other words, if I take 5pills on an empty stomach I will flushed out completely in about 6hours. I don’t like that I have to “go” several times a day and have to run to get there. I prefer one bowel movement then done for the day. But I still use it because it doesn’t hurt my stomach at all.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lemons

customer_reviews.title: I'm Glad I Discovered This!
customer_reviews.text: So happy to have this bottle around my kitchen. This really helped me whenever I felt constipated or bloated (or even over-indulged). I did both the cleansing and then afterwards, I did some maintenance whenever I feel like I ate too much for a certain day. This product was also effective for me when I wanted to lose those last stretch of pounds (accompanied by a proper diet, of course!).
customer_reviews.author: Nettey

customer_reviews.title: AMAZE
customer_reviews.text: I've taken magnesium for 10 years and just switched to this brand. This is by far the best I've ever taken. All my friends now take it. It's awesome. Even if you have ibs or other constipation issues that you could never resolve before, these will help!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. If I over eat or just want to do a cleanse, it works really well. The most wonderful this is that there is NO cramping like when you take a laxative. It does an excellent job and can help you stay on track especially if your trying to loose weight. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Vonnie

customer_reviews.title: 💩 🙌🏼
customer_reviews.text: Works the best!! Weight lost and 💩 movements! Tried everything for a normal movements. This is the answer!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: These work well for me it helps me go and it isn't dramatic or hit me at a random time. I take at night before bed and the next morning at the latest I have a movement.
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: I get the hype!
customer_reviews.text: The third day was the charm! Three pills was way too much so when I reduced it to two pills, things got better. No cramping, bloating or discomfort after I reduced the pill count and the effectiveness of this cleanse can’t be overstated. Give this product a try, it’s definitely worth the time and money!
customer_reviews.author: mholly99

customer_reviews.title: 3-4 between 5 to 9 pm gets the job done ...
customer_reviews.text: 3-4 between 5 to 9 pm gets the job done by morning. I've not experienced any side effects. It's quite a smooth process l. 👌
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Leighanne Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Oh Boyyyy
customer_reviews.text: This product works. Follow directions on the bottle. Take 5 at night (it is plant based), and watch magic work in the morning. It doesn't work for my bff, but it works fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Marlo Harper

customer_reviews.title: Anything Frozen
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, and does what its supposed to. I would recommend starting at a lower than recommended doze, no more than 3, to see how it effects you first. You don't want to spend an entire day not being able to leave the bathroom. I've taken them for a month cleansing, and only three times took 4, the rest of the time, 3 was plenty for me to do the job. If you see 3 is not enough, you can always increase the next day. Overall, I would recommend to anyone wanting to cleanse and get rid of build-up gunk.
customer_reviews.author: Inga

customer_reviews.title: Work like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Work like a charm, have bought a second bottle. Be certain to take time to figure out how many capsules you personally will need to take. One capsule too many, and you will need to be in close proximity to a restroom until you are empty
customer_reviews.author: Davita Nobles

customer_reviews.title: No more feeling like a stuffed sausage.
customer_reviews.text: Looooovvveee Mag07!!!!! These are great. Good detox without any cramping, which is awesome. I take 3 pills at night, and it’s true, everything is ready to leave your body the next morning... And did I mention that there is NNNOOOOOO CRAMPING.... They also help me with bloating. The only thing is it’s hard for the pills to go down but that could be me because I despise taking pills..
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: These capsules work great. I lost 7 inches from my stomach in ...
customer_reviews.text: These capsules work great. I lost 7 inches from my stomach in 10 days. All you have to do is figure out your magic number(mine was 5 capsules) and take it at bedtime with a glass of water. Just make sure yougive yourself enough time in the morning when you wake up because you are definitely going to the bathroom as soon as you wake up. I love this product so much that I'm already on my second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Helps with bloating
customer_reviews.text: I picked up a sample of mag07 at a local health food store and tried it for bloating and rumbling stomach. I took one in the morning and one later in the day. As it was a sample, there were only 4 pills in the pack, but It really helped within the two days. I wanted to get more at our local store, but due to COVID 19, our store was not open. I ordered online, and within a few days my order was here.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda McAdams

customer_reviews.title: Made me very gassy and watery stool
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions I started off by taking 3pills on Sunday and didn't do anything extra for me. Monday night I took 4 and my movement was just like water. Tuesday night I took 5 stool still just water and it gave me the worst gas. My stomach made that roaring sound all day long loud. Not happy with it done nothing for me
customer_reviews.author: NIKKI

customer_reviews.title: No bad stomach pains/cramps at all
customer_reviews.text: This stuff here, really works. No bad stomach pains/cramps at all. But, when its time to go, its time to go. Really good for the digestive system. I'll take four to five at a time if I want a good bowel movement.
customer_reviews.author: Phee

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Mag 07 is the truth! Doesn't give you an upset stomach or bubble guts but when it's time..... IT'S TIME! Lol.... Everything goes smooth
customer_reviews.author: Raven G

customer_reviews.title: Refund Policy Is Misleading
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak on the product's effectiveness but gave it poor ratings based on their REFUND POLICY. The Seller's storefront defers to the Amazon Fulfillment Policy which is 30 days for most unopened products. I found no listing or reason to think this product was not returnable especially unopened within the 30-day window. However, if you purchase and decide to return it for refund or credit, you will be sadly disappointed. No REFUND and I don't see any exceptions. So, I'm stuck with an unopened, never used bottle of 90 capsules and out $26.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael I Ashanti

product_meta.title: Aerobic Life Mag 07 Oxygen Digestive System Cleanse and Detox Capsules, 90 Count
feature_bullets: Aerobic Life MagO7 is the Ultimate Oxygenating Digestive System Cleanse; Cleanse and detoxify your colon overnight; Easy to use; receive the body detox benefits of MagO7 in capsule form

Mag 07 digestive cleanse formula is a unique combination of ozonated magnesium compounds and all natural ingredients. All ingredients in Mag O7 are all-natural, safe and effective. Vegan, Non-GMO, Gluten Free and Free of Gums and Preservatives

Mag O7 detox cleanse supplement releases oxygen that travels the digestive tract supporting healthy gut flora and overall gut health; Over time waste can build up in the intestinal tract and colon which can be harmful to digestive health; Mag O7 is a body detox supplement that helps break down hardened fecal matter and detoxify the colon.

Mag O7 oxygen supplement works to break down and clean the digestive track and remove old debris without gas, bloating or cramping; magnesium works to soften the intestinal build up and remove unwanted waste

Benefits of MagO7 include full digestive cleanse, body detoxification, relief of occasional constipation, oxygen support, and creating a healthy probiotic environment; easy to use in capsule form with 90 capsules total
